title: Webroot Premium 2025 with Allstate Identity Protection | 5 Device, 1 Year | Antivirus and Internet Security Software, Advanced Dark Web Monitoring, Password Manager | NEW [Online Code]
description: Keep your devices and identity safe with Webroot Premium, the advanced anti-virus solution that proactively blocks emerging threats. Our lightweight and fast software won't slow down your computer, allowing you to work and browse with ease. Plus, with our partnership with Allstate Identity Protection, you'll have advanced ID protection with proactive monitoring and fast alerts alongside coverage for up to $1 million in expense reimbursement for stolen funds and out-of-pocket costs due identity theft. Protect yourself while you do everyday activities like banking, shopping, and browsing online with Webroot Premium, the all-in-one solution for device and identity protection.
